result.eng: I was ill, so I could not go to school.
result.ga: Bhí mé tinn mar sin níorbh fhéidir liom dul ar scoil
result.orig: Bhí mé tinn mar sin níorbh fhéidir liom dul ar scoil
result.html: Bhí mé tinn mar sin níorbh fhéidir liom dul ar scoilI was ill, so I could not go to school.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé tinn mar sin níorḃ ḟéidir liom dul ar scoilI was ill, so I could not go to school.

result.eng: The life of an ordinary worker was nothing to be proud of.
result.ga: Níorbh aon ghaisce ná údar mórtais saol an ghnáthoibrí
result.orig: Níorbh aon ghaisce ná údar mórtais saol an ghnáthoibrí
result.html: Níorbh aon ghaisce ná údar mórtais saol an ghnáthoibríThe life of an ordinary worker was nothing to be proud of.
result.ponchtml: Níorḃ aon ġaisce ná údar mórtais saol an ġnáṫoibríThe life of an ordinary worker was nothing to be proud of.

result.eng: I love bridges but this was not the reason of my visit.
result.ga: Tá grá agam do dhroichid ach níorbh é seo fáth mo chuairte
result.orig: Tá grá agam do dhroichid ach níorbh é seo fáth mo chuairte
result.html: Tá grá agam do dhroichid ach níorbh é seo fáth mo chuairteI love bridges but this was not the reason of my visit.
result.ponchtml: Tá grá agam do ḋroiċid aċ níorḃ é seo fáṫ mo ċuairteI love bridges but this was not the reason of my visit.

result.eng: It was no surprise at all for me that she was a spy.
result.ga: Níorbh iontas ar bith dom gur spiaire í
result.orig: Níorbh iontas ar bith dom gur spiaire í
result.html: Níorbh iontas ar bith dom gur spiaire íIt was no surprise at all for me that she was a spy.
result.ponchtml: Níorḃ iontas ar biṫ dom gur spiaire íIt was no surprise at all for me that she was a spy.

result.eng: It was no surprise that an academic life was in store for the young boy when his mother was a medical doctor.
result.ga: Níorbh aon ionadh gurbh é an saol acadúil a bhí i ndán don bhuachaill óg agus a mháthair ina dochtúir leighis
result.orig: Níorbh aon ionadh gurbh é an saol acadúil a bhí i ndán don bhuachaill óg agus a mháthair ina dochtúir leighis
result.html: Níorbh aon ionadh gurbh é an saol acadúil a bhí i ndán don bhuachaill óg agus a mháthair ina dochtúir leighisIt was no surprise that an academic life was in store for the young boy when his mother was a medical doctor.
result.ponchtml: Níorḃ aon ionaḋ gurḃ é an saol acadúil a ḃí i ndán don ḃuaċaill óg agus a ṁáṫair ina doċtúir leiġisIt was no surprise that an academic life was in store for the young boy when his mother was a medical doctor.

result.eng: It wasn't long before the Nazis had France in their possession as well.
result.ga: Níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh ag na Naitsithe chomh maith
result.orig: Níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh ag na Naitsithe chomh maith
result.html: Níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh ag na Naitsithe chomh maithIt wasn't long before the Nazis had France in their possession as well.
result.ponchtml: Níorḃ ḟada go raiḃ an Ḟrainc ina seilḃ ag na Naitsiṫe ċoṁ maiṫIt wasn't long before the Nazis had France in their possession as well.

result.eng: But that was not the end of the story.
result.ga: Ach níorbh shin é deireadh an scéil
result.orig: Ach níorbh shin é deireadh an scéil
result.html: Ach níorbh shin é deireadh an scéilBut that was not the end of the story.
result.ponchtml: Aċ níorḃ ẛin é deireaḋ an scéilBut that was not the end of the story.

result.eng: Milosevic was not solely responsible for every crime against humanity that happened while Yugoslavia was falling apart.
result.ga: Níorbh é Milosevic amháin faoi ndear gach coir in aghaidh na daonnachta a tharla tráth titim as a chéile don Iúgslaiv
result.orig: Níorbh é Milosevic amháin faoi ndear gach coir in aghaidh na daonnachta a tharla tráth titim as a chéile don Iúgslaiv
result.html: Níorbh é Milosevic amháin faoi ndear gach coir in aghaidh na daonnachta a tharla tráth titim as a chéile don IúgslaivMilosevic was not solely responsible for every crime against humanity that happened while Yugoslavia was falling apart.
result.ponchtml: Níorḃ é Milosevic aṁáin faoi ndear gaċ coir in aġaiḋ na daonnaċta a ṫarla tráṫ titim as a ċéile don IúgslaivMilosevic was not solely responsible for every crime against humanity that happened while Yugoslavia was falling apart.

result.eng: I guess it wasn't worth the hassle.
result.ga: Níorbh fhiú an tairbhe an trioblóid b'fhéidir
result.orig: Níorbh fhiú an tairbhe an trioblóid b'fhéidir
result.html: Níorbh fhiú an tairbhe an trioblóid b'fhéidirI guess it wasn't worth the hassle.
result.ponchtml: Níorḃ ḟiú an tairḃe an trioblóid b'ḟéidirI guess it wasn't worth the hassle.

result.eng: The Nazis didn't stop with Poland  and it wasn't long until they had France in their possession as well.
result.ga: Níor stop na Naitsithe leis an bPolainn agus níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh acu chomh maith
result.orig: Níor stop na Naitsithe leis an bPolainn agus níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh acu chomh maith
result.html: Níor stop na Naitsithe leis an bPolainn agus níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh acu chomh maithThe Nazis didn't stop with Poland and it wasn't long until they had France in their possession as well.
result.ponchtml: Níor stop na Naitsiṫe leis an bPolainn agus níorḃ ḟada go raiḃ an Ḟrainc ina seilḃ acu ċoṁ maiṫThe Nazis didn't stop with Poland and it wasn't long until they had France in their possession as well.

result.eng: It wasn't long before white people started looking at black people as a sub-race.
result.ga: Níorbh fhada gur thosaigh daoine geala ag breathnú ar dhaoine gorma mar fho-chine
result.orig: Níorbh fhada gur thosaigh daoine geala ag breathnú ar dhaoine gorma mar fho-chine
result.html: Níorbh fhada gur thosaigh daoine geala ag breathnú ar dhaoine gorma mar fho-chineIt wasn't long before white people started looking at black people as a sub-race.
result.ponchtml: Níorḃ ḟada gur ṫosaiġ daoine geala ag breaṫnú ar ḋaoine gorma mar ḟo-ċineIt wasn't long before white people started looking at black people as a sub-race.

result.eng: It wasn't long until anti-slavery campaigns started.
result.ga: Níorbh fhada gur thosaigh feachtais in aghaidh na sclábhaíochta
result.orig: Níorbh fhada gur thosaigh feachtais in aghaidh na sclábhaíochta
result.html: Níorbh fhada gur thosaigh feachtais in aghaidh na sclábhaíochtaIt wasn't long until anti-slavery campaigns started.
result.ponchtml: Níorḃ ḟada gur ṫosaiġ feaċtais in aġaiḋ na scláḃaíoċtaIt wasn't long until anti-slavery campaigns started.

result.eng: They were walking quietly and tiredly. But not Jamie: he was young, fit and quick.
result.ga: Bhí siad ag siúl leo go brúite tostach Níorbh é sin do Shéimí é bhí sé óg lúfar gasta
result.orig: Bhí siad ag siúl leo go brúite tostach Níorbh é sin do Shéimí é bhí sé óg lúfar gasta
result.html: Bhí siad ag siúl leo go brúite tostach Níorbh é sin do Shéimí é bhí sé óg lúfar gastaThey were walking quietly and tiredly. But not Jamie: he was young, fit and quick.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí siad ag siúl leo go brúite tostaċ Níorḃ é sin do Ṡéimí é ḃí sé óg lúfar gastaThey were walking quietly and tiredly. But not Jamie: he was young, fit and quick.
